emails.title: Asking for Information (Course Details)
emails.content:
Opening

Hi there,

Hope you're doing well.

Main Details

I'm writing because I'd like some info about your English course. I saw it advertised on your website last week and it looks really interesting. The thing is, I've been wanting to improve my English for ages because I use it quite a bit at work and I feel like I need to get better at it.

I work in tourism and I'm constantly dealing with English-speaking tourists, so I really need to brush up on my communication skills. Your course seems like it would be perfect for what I need, but I just want to check a few details before I commit to signing up.

Action / Request

Can you tell me the start date for the next course and what the schedule is like? I'd also like to know if you give out a certificate at the end that's recognised internationally.

Also, could you let me know how much the course costs in total and whether I can pay in instalments rather than all at once? That would really help me budget for it.

Closing

Thanks a lot! I'm looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best,
[Your Name]

emails.title: Extension for an Assignment
emails.content:
Opening

Hi [Teacher Name],

Hope you're doing well.

Main Details

Could I get an extension on the assignment that's due on [Date]? I'm really sorry to have to ask, and I know it's not ideal timing, but I've had a bit of a difficult week and I've fallen behind with my work.

The problem is that I've been dealing with some family issues over the past few days. My grandmother has been quite unwell and I've had to help out at home more than usual, which has eaten into my study time. I've tried my best to keep on top of everything, but I'm just not going to be able to finish this assignment to a decent standard by the original deadline. I've actually done quite a lot of the research already, I just need a bit more time to write it up properly.

Action / Request

I've had personal circumstances that have made it really hard to focus, and I'm a bit behind schedule now. Would it be okay if I handed it in on [New Date] instead? That would give me enough time to finish it without rushing and to make sure the quality is where it should be.

I completely understand if you can't approve this, but I'd really appreciate it if you could. I promise it won't happen again.

Closing

Thanks for understanding! I really appreciate you considering this.

Best,
[Your Name]

emails.title: Problem With an Order
emails.content:
Opening

Hi Customer Service,

I hope you can help.

Main Details

I've got an issue with my order [number] and I'm pretty disappointed to be honest. I've ordered from you loads of times before and I've never had any problems, which is why I'm a bit surprised that this has happened.

I ordered a pair of trainers last week and they arrived yesterday. When I opened the box, I could see straight away that something wasn't right. The trainers are completely the wrong size - I ordered a size 8 and these are clearly a size 10. On top of that, they're not even the colour I ordered. I wanted the black ones and you've sent me white ones instead. I double-checked my order confirmation email and I definitely ordered the right thing, so this is obviously a mistake on your end.

Action / Request

The trainers arrived in the wrong size and colour, so obviously I can't use them. I haven't even taken them out of the box properly because I knew I'd need to send them back.

Can you let me know how to return them and get either the correct item sent out or my money back? I'd actually prefer a refund at this point because I needed them for this weekend and it's too late now anyway.

Closing

Thanks! Hope you can sort this out quickly.

Best,
[Your Name]

emails.title: Applying for a Job (Part-Time)
emails.content:
Opening

Hi [Name/Team],

Hope you're doing well.

Main Details

I'm applying for the part-time shop assistant role you posted on the jobs board last week. I think I'd be really good for this position because I've got experience working in retail and I genuinely enjoy dealing with customers.

I'm currently studying at college and I'm looking for part-time work that fits around my classes. I worked in a clothes shop last summer and I learned loads about customer service, working the till, and keeping the shop floor tidy and well organised. I got on really well with my colleagues and the manager there said she'd be happy to give me a reference. I'm the kind of person who likes to stay busy and I'm always happy to help out with whatever needs doing. I'm also pretty good at handling difficult situations calmly, which I know is important when you're dealing with the public.

Action / Request

I've got experience with customer service and till work and I can work evenings and weekends, which I saw in your advert is what you need.

I attached my CV which has more details about my previous jobs and my availability. I'd love to come in for a chat anytime that suits you to tell you a bit more about myself and why I think I'd be a good fit for your team.

Closing

Thanks! Really hope to hear from you.

Best,
[Your Name]

emails.title: Booking a Reservation
emails.content:
Opening

Hi,

Hope you're well.

Main Details

I'd like to book a reservation at your restaurant for next month. A couple of my friends have been there recently and they couldn't stop going on about how great it was, so I thought I'd give it a try myself. I'm organising a birthday meal for my best mate and I want to take her somewhere nice.

We're not a huge group, just five or six of us, but I wanted to make sure I book in advance because I know popular places can get really busy, especially at weekends. From what I've heard, your food is amazing and the atmosphere is really relaxed and friendly, which is exactly what we're after. We want somewhere we can sit and chat for a few hours without feeling rushed.

Action / Request

It's for five or six people on Saturday 22nd March at around 7:30 PM. We're pretty flexible on time though, so if that slot's already taken, we could do a bit earlier or later.

Can you confirm if that date works and whether you need me to pay a deposit or anything? Also, one of my friends is vegetarian - do you have good veggie options on the menu?

Closing

Thanks! Really looking forward to it.

Best,
[Your Name]
